title: Always The Victim
description: When another hunter uses **protect someone** to protect you, they mark experience. Whenever a monster captures you, you mark experience.

title: Oops!
description: If you want to stumble across something important, tell the Keeper. You will find something important and useful, although not necessarily related to your immediate problems.

title: Let's Get Out Of Here!
description: If you can protect someone by telling them what to do, or by leading them out, roll +Charm instead of +Tough.

title: Panic Button (+Sharp)
description: When you need to escape, name the route you'll try and roll +Sharp.

outcomes.text: You're out of danger, no problem.
You can go or stay, but if you go it's going to cost you (you leave something behind or something comes with you).

title: The Power of Heart
description: When fighting a monster, if you **help someone**, don't roll +Cool. You automatically help as though you'd rolled a 10.

title: Trust Me (+Charm)
description: When you tell a normal person the truth in order to protect them from danger, roll +Charm.

outcomes.text: They'll do what you say they should, no questions asked.
They do it, but the Keeper chooses one:
bullets: They ask you a hard question first.
They stall and dither a while.

outcomes.text: They're going to think you're crazy and maybe dangerous too.

title: What Could Go Wrong?
description: Whenever you charge into immediate danger without hedging your bets, hold 2.

outcomes.text: You may spend your hold to:
bullets: Take +2 forward on an **act under pressure** roll.

title: Don't Worry, I'll Check It Out
description: Whenever you go off by yourself to check out somewhere (or something) scary, mark experience.

title: Mundane Weapons
pick: Golf club, baseball bat, cricket bat, or hockey stick (2-harm hand innocuous messy)
Pocket knife or multitool (1-harm hand useful small)
Small handgun (2-harm close loud reload)
Hunting rifle (3-harm far loud reload)
Sledge-hammer or fire axe (3-harm hand messy)
Nunchuks (2-harm hand area)

title: Means of Transport
description: You get one means of transport.
pickOne: Fairly new car in decent condition

submoves.title: Starting Moves
submoves.description: You get all the basic moves, plus pick three Mundane moves

title: Improvement
description: When you have filled all five experience boxes, you level up. Erase the marks and pick from below.
pick: Get +1 Charm (Max +3)
Get +1 Cool (Max +2)
Get +1 Sharp (Max +2)
Get +1 Tough (Max +2)
Take another Mundane move
Take another Mundane move
Get back one used Luck point
Get back one used Luck point
Take a move from another playbook
Take a move from another playbook

title: Advanced Improvements
description: After you have leveled up *five* times, you additionally qualify for advanced improvements.
pick: Get +1 to any rating (Max +3)
Change this hunter to a new type
Create a second hunter to play as well as this one
Mark two of the basic moves as advanced
Mark another two of the basic moves as advanced
Retire this hunter to safety
Get back one used Luck point
Get back one used Luck point
